## Type of Change

<!-- Mark the relevant option with an "x" -->

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New framework (adds a new institutional reasoning framework)
- [ ] Enhancement (improves existing functionality)
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Test coverage improvement
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)

## Framework Checklist (if applicable)

<!-- If adding a new framework, ensure all items are checked -->

- [ ] Framework implementation in `frameworks/<name>/index.ts`
- [ ] TypeScript types exported
- [ ] Example usage in `frameworks/<name>/example.ts`
- [ ] Unit tests (if applicable)
- [ ] E2E test (optional but recommended)
- [ ] Documentation in framework file
- [ ] Added to MCP server tools list
- [ ] Added to README framework list

## Testing

<!-- Describe the tests you ran to verify your changes -->

- [ ] Unit tests pass (`bun test:unit`)
- [ ] Type checking passes (`bun typecheck`)
- [ ] E2E tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Manual testing completed

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the project's code style
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
